Package de.upb.m2m.quality.configurator.jobs

Implements the general work flow of the M2M Quality framework.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractTransformationConfigurationJob An abstract class for configuring transformation jobs.
LanguageParserJob This class is responsible for controlling (1) the parsing of a transformation file to a language-specific AST representation and (2) the calculation of lines of code metrics for the transformation file.
M2MQualityCompositeJob Implements the general work flow of the M2M Quality framework.
PrepareM2MQualityBlackboardPartitionJob Job for preparing the work flow's blackboard for a measurement of metrics for a specific language.
QVTOTransformationJob Configures and executes a QVT-O transformation job.
QVTRConfigurationJob Configures a QVT-R transformation job.
QVTRLinesOfCodeJob This class allows to implant lines of code metrics into a loaded QVTMetrics model.
 

Package de.upb.m2m.quality.configurator.jobs Description

Implements the general work flow of the M2M Quality framework. The work flow first parses each language of interest to create a language-specific AST model and transforms it to a quality metrics model. It is started by the M2M Quality UI plug-in (de.upb.m2m.quality.ui). The work flow consists of several jobs which are included within this package. The main job is implemented in the "M2MQualityCompositeJob" class. This class implements the work flow as described above. Therefore, the class structures the distinct parts of the work flow into several subjobs and sets up the correct execution order of the jobs. The subjobs are implemented within the remaining classes of this package.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Sebastian Lehrig (lehrig@mail.upb.de)
